command: sudo iptables -A INPUT -p tcp --dport 80 -m string --string "X-Activate: 1" --algo bm -m recent --name T1205_HTTP --set -j LOG --log-prefix "T1205_HTTP_SIG "
explanation: Flags HTTP requests containing a covert control header (X-Activate: 1) as a signaling mechanism, aligning with T1205 application-layer signaling.
rationale_steps: Inspect HTTP headers with string match to detect nonstandard control fields.
Set recent state and log to support alerting on covert HTTP signals.
